section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element defines menu items for option tags with a type of 'menu'.
This element is optional and may appear one or more times per option.

attributes.attribute: The caption text for the item.
The value of the item as used by the engine.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: When settings are applied, the variable defined in the parent option should be set to the value of the selected item.

section.title: Examples
section.example: <item value="hh:nn" label="12 hour format"/> <item value="HH:nn" label="24 hour format"/>
